title: Zero-Waste Hair Care: Treating Dandruff Naturally
author: Harish
excerpt: Shampoo bars offer a sustainable way to manage dandruff with herbs like neem, tea tree, and bhringraj.
content:
Why Switch to a Shampoo Bar?

Shampoo bars reduce plastic waste, last longer than liquid shampoos, and are packed with concentrated herbs. They’re ideal for travelers and eco-conscious households.

Herbs That Target Dandruff

  • Neem: Antimicrobial and soothing.
  • Bhringraj: Strengthens roots and reduces shedding.
  • Tea tree: Clears flakes and reduces itchiness.

A Simple Routine

Wet hair well, work the bar to a rich lather, massage deeply into the scalp, and rinse. Follow with a light conditioner or herbal rinse if needed.

Expectations & Patience

Natural anti-dandruff care takes time. Consistent use over 2–4 weeks usually shows improvements. Severe dandruff or psoriasis should be evaluated by a dermatologist.

Shop Herbal Shampoo Bar and embrace clean, natural care.
